pages.text: $(li)The Coal is an item that can be found and mined in the caves over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Some creatures as the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/wither_skeleton)Wither Skeletons$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/quark/foxhound)Foxhounds$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/soul_vulture)Soul Vultures$(/l) may drop this item upon death.$(br)$(li)You can find Coal in $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) too.

$(li)Coal can be used as a fuel in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smoker)Smoker$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/blast_furnace)Blast Furnace$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:utility/environmental/kiln)Kiln$(/l).$(br)$(li)One Coal can smell up to eight items.$(br)$(li)Coal can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/fire_charge)Fire Charges$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/others/torchs)Torches$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/decorative_blocks/braziers)Braziers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/coal_block)Coal Blocks$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/campfire)Campfires$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) too.
